mapper.insert:
select seq_family_shopping_list.nextval as id
insert into family_shopping_list values(#{id},#{productName,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{amountBudget,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},SYSDATE() ,SYSDATE(),'0',#{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{priorityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{priorityLevel2,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
